actions.description: A list of action items that appear below the content of the comment
actions.description_zh: 在评论内容下面呈现的操作项列表

author.description: The element to be displayed as the author of the note
author.description_zh: 要显示为注释作者的元素

avatar.description: The element to be displayed as a comment avatar - usually antd 'avatar' or src
avatar.description_zh: 要显示为评论头像的元素 - 通常是 antd `Avatar` 或者 src

content.description: The main content of the review

datetime.description: A description of the time it was shown
